Room.Name: Back Hallway
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a hallway behind the registration desk of the Dragon Tooth Inn.
Room.LongDescription: You must not have seen the sign telling you to keep out. There's a reason for signs, you know. This long hallway stops at the southern wall of the inn, with only one doorway going to a storage room on the east. The desk is to the north. The storage room has a new lock on it, and another but bigger sign says, "KEEP OUT." The desk clerk probably has the key, but why do you insist on violating the rules?
